alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:50PM EDT until July 02 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Perry, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Secotan, Boyd, Smith, Lake Bird, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs, Shady Grove and Fenholloway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
